steps: Analyze the user's coding task description to extract requirements and constraints.
Clarify ambiguous requirements by identifying edge cases and assumptions.
Select appropriate programming languages, frameworks, and tools based on task requirements.
Design the solution architecture and define data structures or interfaces.
Implement core functionality in logical, testable units.
Integrate components and ensure proper communication between modules.
Write unit tests for each component and integration tests for the system.
Debug and fix issues identified during testing.
Optimize code for performance, readability, and maintainability.
Document the code, including comments and usage examples.
Validate the final implementation against all requirements.
Package and prepare the solution for deployment or delivery.
